en.today: The Gemini quarter moon will test your critical thinking skills, dear Aries, making it essential that you avoid jumping to conclusions. Reverting to patterns you've fought to break could also be an unwelcome side effect, so try to be intentional with the decisions you make. Spread positivity when Chiron stirs later this afternoon, looking for opportunities to boost morale and heal strained relationships. Try not to pry when Luna squares Saturn this evening, as it would be easy to overstep without realizing it. Keep the mind occupied with a healthy activity such as reading or journaling before heading to bed.

en.today: Avoid competitive social hierarchies under this morning's Gemini quarter moon, dearest Leo, which could trigger jealousy and gossip. Be mindful of what you hold space for conversationally, setting boundaries with people who bring malicious intent or negativity to the table. You'll be rewarded for taking the high road once Chiron activates later this afternoon, bringing you closer to the divine. If you're in need of any guidance or support from beyond, use this energy to communicate with your higher power. Be mindful of how much you share online when Luna squares Saturn this evening, taking care to protect your privacy.

en.today: Be present and keep a fair distance from your electronic devices, darling Taurus, as the Gemini quarter moon pulls you away from the digital realms and into the material world. Your eye for detail increases as your senses intensify, helping you make astute observations that can improve existing circumstances. Take a breather later in the afternoon when Chiron stirs, inviting you to embrace all things comforting and healing, especially if you've been carrying a lot of stress or grief recently. Resist the temptation to zone out with your screens when Luna squares Saturn this evening, seeking experiences that enrich instead.

en.today: The quarter moon rises in your sign today, dearest Gemini, which could put you in the crosshairs of new professional challenges. Staying visible will be necessary for maintaining the respect of peers, but you'll need to walk the fine line between taking accountability and accepting blame. Don't let others pin their mistakes on you; keep the focus on solutions instead of pointing fingers. A sense of community will soothe out any rifts that found you this morning once Chiron stirs later in the afternoon, paving the way for fresh starts. Avoid pushing yourself too far once evening emerges and Luna squares Saturn, even if you're called to work overtime.
